snippet: Philip Humber has been in the bullpen since early August, having gone 4-5 with a 7.21 E.R.A. in 14 starts after the perfect game.
abstract: Philip Humber has been in the bullpen since early August, having gone 4-5 with a 7.21 E.R.A. in 14 starts after the perfect game.

headline.main: Humber a Long Way From Perfect
headline.print_headline: Extra Bases: A Long Way From Perfect
